channel.title: >>.How do i add whip colours?.<<
channel.description:
Hey guys, how do i add other whip colours on a 317 server ? like:
-Dragon / Red whip -Rune whip -Barrows whip
If any knows can the say how ? or pm me your msn :)
thanks,

item.title: >>.How do i add whip colours?.<<
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Mendorphins:

Also, don’t ask. It’s rude and un-earnt. Rep–.

item.title: >>.How do i add whip colours?.<<
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“ipkudown, post:7, topic:371157”]il’l help you

dont forget to rep++ me

if(i == 10105) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10394; class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = " Barrows Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "This item shows that you've donated to Doodurspk, thank you!".getBytes(); }

if (i == 8014) // item id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Rune Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "This item shows that you've donated to Doodurspk, thank you!".getBytes(); }

if (i == 9093) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "This item shows that you've donated to Doodurspk, thank you!".getBytes(); }[/quote]

Also, don’t ask. It’s rude and un-earnt. Rep–.

Hmm 317 server??
if so you have to go into class8 and add the models
[/quote]

You don’t need to add models for a recolour

@OP Wrong section, Try posting this in Client Help[/quote]

OH L… i didnt know for sure never added coulered whips
